divs: Sighting DetailsI witnessed a black triangle in the sky on October 3rd, 2010, on a Sunday. According to my notebook: "Saw the black triangle moving slowly from south to north -- just east of us. Wish I had my camera out there, and it did have the telephoto lens on it! It would have been so simple." I do not believe these triangular types of UFOs are extra-terrestrial, but I do know about Skunk Works, and all of the things the government experiments with there. This black triangle (an elongated triangle style) was most likely one of those. Just wish I had gotten that picture. I was in my backyard on that Sunday morning, and heard the sound of a jet. We live not too far from an airport, so that is nothing unusual. I enjoy watching the planes and jets flying overhead. It was high overcast clouds that morning. I looked to the west where the sound was coming from, and then to the east, and saw the black triangle, and it was at quite a high altitude, but I could still see it was a black triangle. I know the jet sound was not coming from it. I did not see the jet the sound was coming from, but may have been out of sight because of trees. The triangle was too high for making that much of a sound, anyway. The black triangle moved very slowly in a straight line from south the north. It simply vanished into the distance, and took quite a while to disappear. I thought about getting my camera, but was afraid it would disappear before I could get to it.
trends: There have been 48 other sightings in Modesto
There was one other sighting in Modesto on or around October 3rd 2010
